events.title: the Beatles' first play live in the US

movie.title: I Wanna Hold Your Hand
movie.plot: If they missed Beatles' first appearance in the U.S.A. they would hate themselves for the rest of their lives! So they (six teenagers from New Jersey) set off even though they don't have tickets for the show! The journey is full of surprises and misfortunes but the young ladies are determined to reach to their idols...

events.title: the Beatles' first live event in the US

movie.title: Birth of the Beatles
movie.plot: An account of The Beatles during the Hamburg years, their signing with Brian Epstein and their inevitable rise during the early sixties.

events.title: Ramchandra Siras is suspended from his professorship at AMU

movie.title: Aligarh
movie.plot: Set in the state of Uttar Pradesh and based on true events, the plot revolves around Dr Shrinivas Ramchandra Siras who taught Marathi at Aligarh Muslim University. He was sacked from his position of Reader and Chair of Modern Indian Languages, on charges of homosexuality. A sting operation was conducted by a TV channel which showed him in an embrace with a rickshaw puller, at his house inside the campus.
